content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I am here to assist you with your electrical service needs. May I have your name, please?
Hey, yeah it’s Dave. I’ve got a wire sparking and I want it fixed asap but don’t want to pay too much. What’s your cheapest price for that?

Thanks, Dave. For electrical repairs like sparking wires, prices vary depending on the exact issue. I can schedule a technician to inspect and provide a precise estimate before any work. Could you please provide your address so I can check availability?
I live at 123 Elm Street. But honestly, if you charge me more than 50 bucks I’m not in. Can’t believe you can’t just tell me a fixed price over text though.
Thanks for the address, Dave. I’m checking our schedule and service area now to see when we can send someone by.
We can send a technician as soon as tomorrow afternoon. What time would be best for you?
Tomorrow afternoon? Sounds late. I want early morning and cheaper than 50. I’m not sure you can do that. Are you sure I don’t have to pay a trip fee or anything?
The earliest we could do is 8 AM tomorrow. There is a standard trip fee included, but we will inform you upfront about all costs before starting work. Can I book 8 AM for you?
Ugh, I dunno. 8 AM is early but that extra fee still bugs me. If the fix is simple then maybe it’s not worth it. Can I just call someone cheaper around here? Just want a rough price now!

I understand your concern, Dave. Unfortunately, exact price quotes require an in-person assessment for safety and accuracy. I can note your preference for a short visit and keep you updated. Would you still like to book the 8 AM slot or another time?
Maybe later, I’ll think about it. Don’t wanna book something I might cancel. Thanks anyway.
